PIONEER EXPERIENCES: A GENERAL QUESTIONNAIRE

NO. 2

A. INDEX OF QUESTIONNAIRE TO THE PIONEER EXPERIENCES

B. GENERAL INSTRUCTIONS FOR COMPLETING THIS QUESTIONNAIRE

It is difficult to prepare a general questionnaire on pioneer life because each individual who is asked to answer it has already answered questions in another questionnaire. The questions here will not apply to your experiences or memories of pioneer life. If you do not have enough space to answer all the questions, please feel free to answer only those that interest you.

This questionnaire is intended for persons who lived in Western Canada before 1930, and who have personal experience of the pioneer years whether they be in this province or not.

If more than one member of the family can answer the questions, they should write them on separate sheets or apply for a separate questionnaire.
